Reentrancy in HardcapCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#563-590):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_hasClosed()) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#564-565)
	- _tokenCap = _token.totalSupply().mul(100).div(CROWDSALE_PERCENTAGE) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#572-576)
	- require(bool)(_token.mint(teamTokenHolder,_tokenCap.mul(TEAM_PERCENTAGE).div(100))) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#576-577)
	- require(bool)(_token.mint(platform,_tokenCap.mul(PLATFORM_PERCENTAGE).div(100))) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#577-580)
	- _tokensToBurn = _token.cap().sub(_token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#581-583)
	- require(bool)(_token.mint(address(this),_tokensToBurn)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#583-585)
	- _token.burn(_tokensToBurn) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#585-586)
	- require(bool)(_token.finishMinting()) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#586-587)
	- _token.transferOwnership(wallet) (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#587-588)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalizedTime (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#590)
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol#590)

TeamTokenHolder.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0xf51978050b69c1bb4b4734511fdfcc7bb63a9492.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
